Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have a plugin that plays a certain sound. However when i have multiple parts which i use as a module to my plugin it plays the sound multiple times and at the same time. How can i solve this issue?
You can use a static class. When sound is playing, don't allow for another one to start.

You can use a static class. When sound is playing, don't allow for another one to start.

Thanks. Thats exactly what i did and it worked. If anyone is having the same trouble turns out there is a youtube guide here.
